nn.core

Class NeuronUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • nn.core.NeuronUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Unit

    public abstract class NeuronUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Unit
    Base class for the non-input units of a NeuralNetwork.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double delta
      Error term computed during backprop.

      Vector of Units connected to this NeuronUnit's inputs.

      List of NeuronUnits whose inputs are connected to this NeuronUnit's output.
      protected double output
      This NeuronUnit's output value.
      protected double[] weights
      The vector of weights for this NeuronUnit's inputs.

    • Field Detail

      • inputs

        protected Unit[] inputs
        Vector of Units connected to this NeuronUnit's inputs. The first element of this vector, a_0, is automatically initialized to a ConstantUnit with value 1.0 (AIMA p. 728).

      • outgoingConnections

        public java.util.List<NeuronUnit> outgoingConnections
        List of NeuronUnits whose inputs are connected to this NeuronUnit's output. This is used for backprop. Kind of ugly to use a list for this, but who cares once the network is built.

      • weights

        protected double[] weights
        The vector of weights for this NeuronUnit's inputs.

      • output

        protected double output
        This NeuronUnit's output value.

      • delta

        public double delta
        Error term computed during backprop.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuronUnit

        public NeuronUnit(int ninputs)

    • Method Detail

      • numInputs

        public int numInputs()

      • setInputUnit

        public void setInputUnit(int i,
                         Unit u)
        Connect the given unit as this NeuronUnit's i'th input. If the unit is itself a NeuronUnit, then we also add this NeuornUnit to its list of outgoing connections.

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(int i,
                      double w)

      • getWeights

        public double[] getWeights()

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight(int i)

      • getOutput

        public double getOutput()
        Return the output value of this Unit.
        Specified by:
        getOutput in interface Unit

      • getInputSum

        public double getInputSum()
        Return the weighted sum of this NeuronUnit's inputs. This is used in the backpropagation algorithm.

      • fire

        public void fire()
        ``Each unit j first computes a weighted sum of its inputs. Then it applies an activation function g to this sum to derive the output.'' (AIMA p728).
        Specified by:
        fire in interface Unit

      • activation

        public abstract double activation(double in)
        The activation function used by this NeuronUnit. This method must be specified by subclassses.

      • update

        public abstract void update(double[] inputs,
                            double output,
                            double alpha)
        Update the weights of this NeuronUnit using the given input values, the given output value, and learning rate (alpha).
        Specified by:
        update in interface Unit
